effect.sword_shield: Deals regular damage. Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user attacks with an energy-draining kiss that restores the user’s HP.
